BVR kill chain: Twin-engine 4.5-gen with RBE2-AA AESA radar (200+ km detection), 4-6 internal/external Meteor/MICA-NG loads, and SPECTRA EW for fire-and-forget BVR; F4 upgrades (2025 IOC) add AI targeting and drone integration; backbone of Air and Space Force squadrons, enabling 150 km networked envelopes via E-3F cueing; total fleet including Navy approaching 225. Upgraded Hercules with modern avionics for rapid radar/fighter deployment and ISR cueing; 2 operational post-2024 deliveries (2 more on order); ET 2/61 at Orleans, enhances ground-radar gap-filling for BVR networks.
